Dialogue.Page: This platform showcases the winners of the modding community’s fourth mod jam, held in October of 2024 with the themes of “Isolation” and "Escape".
This jam had a special restriction, forcing modders to use minimal text in their mods. The restriction proved itself challenging, as some modders have struggled.
However, this restriction allowed for the creation of some great DLC-based mods which before were not as plentiful.
If you want to, you can meet the creators of these mods at the party on the north pole!
